creditsLines: Oleja: Alpha
Игра Дани Белога
По мотивам неснятого короткометражного кинофильма 'Олежа' (2017)
В роли Олежи - Илья Олегович Грудкин
Музыка Дани Белога
В игре использованы беспланые ассеты из Unity Asset Store:

'Adventure Character' by Maksim Bugrimov
'Apartment Kit' by Brick Project Studio
'Avatar Maker Free - 3D avatar from a single selfie' by itSeez3D Inc

'Cabin Environment' by Gregory Seguru
'Environmental Asset Pack' by Joshua Pearson

'Free Hut Pack' by StormBringer Studios
'*FREE* Skyboxes - Terrestrial' by Dogmatic
'Free Smartphone' by Vertex Studio

'Key and Lock' by CG Cell
'Laptop's Package' by Runflyrun
'Lemon Trees' by NUMENA

'Morgue Room PBR' by Rokay3D
'Modern Guns: Handgun' by Nokobot

'Old Bathroom Objects' by OVector Technologies
'Old Road Signs PBR' by Aleksn09

'Padlock' by Nollie Inward Game Assets
'Pickup model' by Perfect Games
'Post Box' by Mariam Sarishvili

'Realistic Fences Pack' by WhiteXopc
'Roof Top Safe House' by AP3X Models

'Shed, Tools, Bridge and Fences' by Quite Vibrant
'Student ID' by Max Bornysov
'Survival Game Tools' by cookiepopworks.com

'The Shed' by Blackant Master Studio
'Tools Pack 1' by RRFreelance / Pixelburner
